function.name: store_bucket_create
function.description: Create a bucket. Creates a new storage bucket owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

name.description: Bucket name. Must be unique per wallet. Alphanumeric, hyphens, underscores.

location.description: Storage region (optional). Defaults to primary region.

function.name: store_bucket_list
function.description: List buckets. Returns all buckets owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of buckets per page (1–100, default 20).

function.name: store_bucket_get
function.description: Get bucket details. Returns details for a single bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_bucket_delete
function.description: Delete a bucket. Deletes a bucket. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_list
function.description: List objects in a bucket. Lists objects in a bucket with optional prefix filtering. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

prefix.description: Filter objects by key prefix (e.g. "notes/" to list only keys starting with "notes/").

limit.description: Maximum number of objects to return (1–1000, default 100).

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from the previous response's `next_cursor`.

function.name: store_object_put
function.description: Upload an object. Uploads an object to a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_get
function.description: Download an object. Downloads an object from a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_delete
function.description: Delete an object. Deletes an object from a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_quota_get
function.description: Get bucket quota and usage. Returns the current quota limit and storage usage for a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_quota_set
function.description: Set bucket quota. Sets the storage quota for a bucket. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

quota_bytes.description: New quota in bytes, or null to reset to default (100 MB).

function.name: store_quota_reconcile
function.description: Reconcile bucket usage. Recomputes the bucket's usage_bytes by scanning actual R2 storage. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).
